works.description:
The copyrighted text from www.Steroid.com was stolen and POSTED ON A BLOG SITE OWNED BY AND REFERRING VIEWERS TO THEIR PRODUCT SELLING SITE http://www.anabolicforsale.co.uk at the infringing URL's below, placing them in direct competition with our paying affiliates.  The perpetrator also embedded anchor links into many of the stolen pages hyper linking to their selling site. 

Steroid.com is protected by the following copyright:
Type of Work:	Text
Registration Number / Date:	TXu001270435 / 2005-07-18 
Title:	Steroid.com’s steroid profiles.

Copyright Note:	C.O. correspondence.
	Cataloged from appl. only.
Names:	Dynamic Sports Nutrition, Inc.
